snippet.title: Winter Burrow - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Join developer Pinecreek Games for a deep dive into the gameplay, features, and what you can expect from Winter Burrow in this new trailer for the cozy woodland survival game. Winter Burrow is a game about a mouse returning home to restore their childhood burrow. Explore, gather resources, craft, knit warm sweaters, bake pies and meet the locals. Winter Burrow will be available on Game Pass. Xbox, PC, and Steam in 2025.
